Attacks.Name: Water Shuriken
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, apply the Bleed special condition to the target character.

Attacks.Name: Night Slash
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is Staggered.

Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 2 of the target character.

Superpowers.Name: Shadow Sneak
Superpowers.Effect: Greninja becomes difficult to target until the start of its next activation, adding 2 dice to its defense rolls when attacked from more than range 3.

Superpowers.Name: Substitute
Superpowers.Effect: Place a Substitute token within range 2. Attacks targeting Greninja can be redirected to the Substitute if it is closer to the attacker.

Attacks.Name: Aerial Ace
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Greninja may make an immediate move action.

Superpowers.Name: Ninja Vanish
Superpowers.Effect: After being attacked, use this superpower to make Greninja immediately invisible, making it untargetable until the end of the attacker's turn. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Battle Bond
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Ash-Greninja character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
